name: Office Experience #1
description:
Me, the best programmer in the world has made a gorgeous game. It has the BEST graphics the MOST INDULGENT AND BEUTIFUL (royalty free) MUSIC.

there are many features in this game, for example:

-going through dialogue

-clicking on buttons

-being punched in the face

Very entertaining

I even have a message from my beta tester.

welcome...CHATGPT

"Best game, i had no criticism it was so good" - Chatgpt

best friend of mine, really, such a charmer.

I hope you enjoy and don't get too obsessed with my game ;)
